org.sql: SELECT note_comments.* FROM note_comments LEFT OUTER JOIN users ON users.id = note_comments.author_id WHERE note_comments.note_id = "$1" ORDER BY note_comments.created_at DESC LIMIT "$2"

rewrites.sql: SELECT note_comments.* FROM note_comments WHERE note_comments.note_id = "$1" ORDER BY note_comments.created_at DESC LIMIT "$2"
